projects.title: Linkedin Clone
projects.description: Developed a LinkedIn-like platform featuring user authentication, and post creation to simulate a professional social network. Utilized React.js, Redux Toolkit, React Router DOM, and Firebase for backend integration. The project enhanced my skills in building scalable, interactive applications and leveraging Firebase for real-time updates and secure data handling.
